peril.views.slick.states

Class LoadingScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • peril.views.slick.states.InteractiveState
        • peril.views.slick.states.LoadingScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState, Container

    public final class LoadingScreen
extends InteractiveState
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a loading screen. Using FileParsers this object will load objects from memory. This object will also determine which state the game starts in based on the map file it loads.
    Since:
    2018-02-26
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    InteractiveState

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image background
      The background Viewable of the LoadingScreen.
      private CoreGameState firstState
      Holds the first CoreGameState the game should load into if the map is loaded from a save.
      private int index
      The index of the current FileParser being parsed.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Music music
      The Music that will be played during the loading state.
      private static java.lang.String NAME
      Holds the name of this LoadingScreen.
      private ProgressBar progressBar
      THe ProgressBar that will be displayed on this loading screen.
      private java.util.List<FileParser> readers
      Holds the List of FileParsers this LoadingScreen will load.
      private boolean terminated
      Whether or not this LoadingScreen has encountered a exception while loaded and is therefore un-able to continue loading the game.
      private Font textFont
      The Font that "finishing up" is displayed in.

      • update

        public void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   int delta,
                   Frame frame)
        Parses the line from the current FileParser. When all the FileParsers are finished this LoadingScreen enters SlickSetup unless the map file specifies otherwise.
        Specified by:
        update in class InteractiveState
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer that contains the game.
        delta - The number of milliseconds between the current frame and the previous.
        frame - The Frame that displays the InteractiveState to the user.
